content.raw: I added the promised one click functionality to sensors and visuals. Also removed all prints. Could you just post me sh style output? Even with grep I get 2200 messages. You can also send me a mail. And could you look over lines 2848 to 2859 and 2882 to 2895 in ModelListWidget.cc? I am not sure if we can handle the uncommented functionality now. I think _msg.pose() does not work.
